abstract: Agricultural Bank of China may struggle to get the kind of valuation it wants as it gears up to launch the world’s biggest initial public offering into a market that has slumped by a fifth in just six weeks, Reuters reported.
snippet: Agricultural Bank of China may struggle to get the kind of valuation it wants as it gears up to launch the world’s biggest initial public offering into a market that has slumped by a fifth in just six weeks, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: The Agricultural Bank of China may struggle to get the kind of valuation it wants as it gears up to introduce one of the world’s biggest initial public offerings into a market that has slumped  a fifth in just six weeks, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Market Slide May Dent AgBank I.P.O. Valuation
